overview: From 2025-07-30 to 2025-07-31, ethereum-optimism/docs had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Update L2 rollup testnet tutorial
topPRs.author: krofax
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

This PR adds a complete, modernized tutorial for deploying an OP Stack testnet chain using the latest `op-deployer` workflow. The tutorial replaces outdated manual deployment approaches with current best practices and provides a step-by-step guide for setting up a full testnet chain.

**Tests**

<!--
Please describe any tests you've added. If you've added no tests, or left important behavior untested, please explain why not.
-->

**Additional context**

<!--
Add any other context about the problem you're solving.
-->

**Metadata**

- Fixes - https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/devrel/issues/650

topContributors.summary: krofax: Today, krofax focused on bugfix and tests work, modifying 2 files with a primary focus on documentation and configuration changes, and has an open PR, ethereum-optimism/docs#1705, to update the L2 rollup testnet tutorial.
